properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT COMMUNITY_NO, COMMUNITY_CATEGORY, COMMUNITY_TITLE, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, VIEWS, LIKES, SPOILER, REPORT_COUNT, ISNOTICE FROM COMMUNITY C JOIN MEMBER ON (COMMUNITY_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ISNOTICE DESC, COMMUNITY_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 10
